potion4@system.name: Potion4
potion4@system.examine:
Upon closer inspection, you see that the flask contains some sort
of very bright bubbling &+Ggreen&N liquid.  On the top of the flask there
is an emblem of some sort, perhaps to signify that the potion itself is
of godly creation.

torch@system.name: torch
torch@system.examine: This torch was sold at the General Store.
torch@system.desc[0]: A torch is on the ground here.

key@system.name: key
key@system.examine: This is a key from the General Store.
key@system.desc[0]: A small skeleton key has been left here.

mush@system.name: mush
mush@system.examine: This food was purchased at the General Store.
mush@system.desc[0]: A pint of fine grade mush has been left here.

system@system.title: The System Room
system@system.description: Here's where objects to be cloned are kept.  Also potions originate here.
